# turkish-octave-1

Pythagorean intervals in Turkish music, octave 1

Data source: [maqamat.yml](../../../maqamat.yml)

## Scale properties

- **Type**: ratios
- **Number of intervals**: 24
- **Intervals**: [1, 256/243, 2187/2048, 65536/59049, 9/8, 32/27, 19683/16384, 8192/6561, 81/64, 4/3, 177147/131072, 1024/729, 729/512, 262144/177147, 3/2, 128/81, 6561/4096, 32768/19683, 27/16, 16/9, 59049/32768, 4096/2187, 243/128, 1048576/531441, 2]

## Source

- **Reference**: mikosch2022
- **Page**: 8

### Bibliography
